node.title: The Takedown of Ancient Israel
node.description: They were God’s chosen people, but that special designation ended with the stoning of Stephen in A.D. 34. What happened to Israel of old? What lessons can we, as “modern Israel,” learn from them? Are we repeating ancient Israel’s mistakes today? This seminar takes a chronological journey from just after the crossing of the Red Sea to the time of Christ, examining the central reasons Israel lost its special designation.
